title: Interpretation of dreams for a married woman marrying an unmarried person in a dream

preview.html: One of the most common things is seeing a wedding in a dream for all occasions and ages. What does the vision show? This is what we will show through your website gptafser.com/ Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a married woman getting married in a dream for a single girl She will quickly get rid of worries. An unmarried woman dreams of her brother’s wife marrying someone other than her brother. This vision belongs to her brother and means that she will obtain many gains and expand her livelihood. A married woman dreams of marrying again in a dream with an unmarried girl wearing a dress. The vision indicates that The girl will enjoy good luck in life and will soon have pleasant things. If an unmarried girl dreams that her father is marrying a married woman. Seeing the father’s wealth means improving his financial situation and improving his health. An unmarried girl dreamed that her fiancé is getting married in a dream. The vision indicates the completion of her marriage to Her fiancé and her happy life with him. Marrying a second wife to an old man means happiness and comfort. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a woman getting married in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a married woman getting married in a dream about a married woman. The dream of a married woman whose husband marries her for the second time in a dream. It symbolizes great luck in life. Life and comfort with her husband. A woman married to her husband dreams of marrying a married woman of beautiful beauty. The vision indicates the abundance of sustenance that will abound in the life of the dreamer and his family. But if she dreams that she is marrying in a dream a man other than her husband that she does not know. The vision symbolizes his departure with joy. Great in the coming period. While he saw her marrying her husband’s brother in a dream. This vision refers to her brother-in-law, the arrival of reassuring news about her brother-in-law. A married woman’s wedding in a dream indicates that she will live in grace and blessings with her husband and children. A married woman dreams that her husband will marry her again. It means that happiness only happens to the wife and husband. The marriage of a married woman in a dream indicates the intimate relationship and affection between them. Her marriage to a prominent man among the people indicates her promotion at work. Interpretation of seeing a married woman in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man’s dream that his wife marries another man in a dream This vision is not disturbing because it indicates the happiness that he and his family will meet soon. If a man dreams that a woman is getting married in front of her husband and he knows her in reality. It indicates that the dreamer will enter into something that brings him happiness and pleasure. To dream of a married woman getting married again in Dreaming of a man, symbolizes that the dreamer is earning a lot of money and expanding his halal livelihood. Also, if a man sees a sister marrying a woman, good things will come that spread throughout the house and change their lives. If a man is sick and dreams of a married woman in a dream that she will get married. The vision symbolizes The dreamer’s marriage to a woman who will not fear God or feel comfortable with her. If a married man dreams that he is marrying his sister, this indicates his good condition. If he dreams that he is marrying his mother in a dream, then

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a married woman’s dream of a black scorpion

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a married woman? Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a married woman: It is interpreted by distress, psychological pressure, marital and personal problems, and many other indications that the dreamer will be surprised by the following lines, noting that the interpretations mentioned in the following paragraphs were collected from reliable interpretation books such as the book of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a married woman. One of the worst symbols that a woman dreams of is the symbol of the black scorpion because it contains bad signs. Many important insights will be presented until you discover the interpretation of this symbol in detail: The big black scorpionWhen the dreamer sees a scorpion Huge with a wide thorn and feels a contraction in his heart in the dream, the vision means an ugly enemy who has great power and an evil spirit and intends to harm her, and it is sad that this enemy is one of her relatives, and it is likely that she will be a woman. The entry of a black scorpion into the dreamer’s clothing: If he tries The dreamer is trying hard to escape from the scorpion in the dream, but he managed to get into her clothes and forcefully deceive her, then this is witchcraft, demonic possession, or intense envy that creates a feeling of exhaustion and a serious illness. The appearance of a black scorpion on the way to work or in the office: This dream is a strong warning that the future of the dreamer’s career is not easy and is full of malicious and malicious people who want to take it many steps backward and bring it into the cycle of failure. The appearance of a scorpion inside her car: If the dreamer is surprised by the presence of a scorpion. In her car, he is an ugly person with an ugly face and morals who interferes in her life violently and without permission and can eavesdrop on her without her knowledge and she should be more. She is careful in her social dealings so as not to give any harmful person the opportunity to harm her. Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion married to Ibn Sirin: A black scorpion walking on her body: If a woman sees in her dream that a scorpion is walking all over her body, and she feels that she is tied to her hands and cannot get it out of her body, then perhaps The dream warns her that the jinn is controlling her, and her inability to recover from this satanic garment or vision indicates a malicious person. Because his desires are his main motivation, and he will get very close to her, to practice evil with her and cause her to fall into a great sin, which is adultery. The scorpion coming out of his mouth: The black scorpion if the dreamer sees it coming out of his mouth, or her tongue resembles a scorpion, and in both cases the dream shows her terrible behavior and ugliness. Her words, where she intentionally harms others with obscene words, or perhaps the dream indicates that she is a talkative and malicious woman. Mixed Scorpio Colors: When a woman dreams that the scorpion is colored in many colors, including black and transparent, she is surrounded by a dangerous enemy who uses against her his strongest weapons: lies and hypocrisy, and shows the opposite of what he hides. In fact, the appearance of a two-headed scorpion: One of the strong symbols in the interpretation is that if the dreamer sees a black two-headed scorpion, this symbolizes the treacherous person she is dealing with in reality, and he is one of the most dangerous people who entered her life because he possesses two weapons or powers in his life, such as money and power, and he will be one of the most dangerous people who entered her life.

title: The most prominent 30 pieces of evidence for interpreting the dream of seeing the king in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Complete interpretations of the interpretation of a dream about seeing a kingInterpretation of a dream about seeing a king in a dreamIt is very accurate, and depends on the personality of this king, whether people love him or not, whether he was able to achieve many victories in his life, what he presented to the dreamer when he saw him, and many other details based on determining the interpretation of the dream, In the following article, you will learn about the secrets of this vision. Follow the following lines. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a king. The king is one of the most beautiful names of God, and when the dreamer sees a happy king in a dream, he expresses his happiness in his behavior and personality, and praises him with many things. Of the positive words, this indicates that the dreamer is a person who knows the limits of his religion and does not transgress them, and since he is devoted and considers God in his actions, this dream that God sent to him to assure him that he loves him and is satisfied with him. The dreamer entering the king’s palace in a dream is evidence of his high position in the world. Life and his appreciation from others because of his high status. When the dreamer receives from the king a beautiful dress studded with diamonds and gold, the significance of the vision means a change in the life of the dreamer, and he may become a king with strong authority in waking life, like the king he saw in him. The dream. The king placed the crown on the dreamer’s head, or a sign of status, or a lot of money, or a promotion at work, or a unique position that he will obtain in the near future. When it appears in the dream that the dreamer has become a great sultan, he is successful in his work and in his relationships with People, the vision shows the power of his religion and the full application of his teachings to reality. Seeing food from the same plate from which the king ate in a dream indicates a lot of diet, because kings and sultans only eat expensive foods cooked in delicious ways. He will be satisfied). Interpretation of the dream of seeing the king by Ibn Sirin: If the dreamer sees one of the sultans giving him one of his states and ordering him to be his ruler in the dream, then the vision will be happy and shows the power that the dreamer will soon gain if he is able to do that, and has the skills that qualify him for this position, for example it may Be an ambassador, a minister, or a president. Seeing the king giving apples to the dreamer in a dream means money from hard work, and if he gives him grapes, then this dream is said by jurists to be one of the best visions and indicates happiness, cover, health, and stability. If the king whom the fortuneteller dreamed of was In a dream he is still alive and sees his palace filled with light, then he will live his golden age and win all the battles that he will fight with the enemies and if he spoils something, God will give him guidance and the right path. Interpretation of dreams for the king to see an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead king for single women is interpreted with successful work And a lot of money resulting from a project or business partnership, provided that the king has a good reputation and has achieved many successes. Ibn Sirin said: If a girl dreams of the dead king and he gives her useful things, then this is a great inheritance that she will soon obtain, and the jurists put this in mind.

title: Interpretation of an explosion in a dream: the meaning of hearing the sound of an explosion

preview.html: Seeing the explosion of an explosive device in the house, a fire, a car explosion, and an explosion of death, fleeing from an explosion in the dream of a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman in the street, by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an explosion. If you see a dream with explosions, it portends (i.e., tells you) repulsive actions (i.e., ugly and reprehensible actions) of these people. associated with you (i.e. this relationship) and these actions will cause you temporary loss and dissatisfaction (i.e. they won). does not last long) and that these actions will cause you temporary loss and dissatisfaction. Work will disturb you. To dream that your face or the faces of others are blackened or disfigured by an explosion, this indicates that you will be accused of foolishness, and that this accusation will be unfair (i.e. injustice and aggression), although circumstances may convict you and help prove it against you. If you see the air Full of smoke and debris, this may indicate unusual dissatisfaction in business circles and a lot of social hostility. If you dream that you are surrounded by fire or flying in the air due to the explosion that engulfed you, this foretells that your unfaithful friends will violate your rights and increase your confidence. Girls and women Girls, if they dream of this, they should warn their colleagues of the opposite sex after this dream, whether they are classmates, work, or any other relationship with them. An explosion or hearing the sound of an explosion varies according to other symbols, but it carries a rumor or exciting news, and the news is often associated with inaccuracy. Or an accusation. It can symbolize a problem, any explosion, or a problem between two people, or evidence of anger and a man’s explosion in the face of others. If a man gets angry, he becomes like an explosion. It can symbolize a disease such as appendicitis. It may symbolize the explosion itself. If we divide the word evil, it can refer to the immoral person, which is an adjective found in the Qur’an. God Almighty said (and the wicked are in hell) and hell is fire, so there is a connection between explosion, ignorance and fire. If you dream of explosions, this foretells that shameful actions committed by those associated with you will cause you temporary loss and dissatisfaction, and this action will also disturb you. If you dream That your face or the faces of others are black or disfigured means that you will accuse them of foolishness, and this accusation will be unjust even if the circumstances may convict you. If you see the air filled with smoke and debris, this indicates unusual dissatisfaction in work circles and a lot of social hostility. If you dream that you are surrounded by With tongues of flame, or a bird flying in the air due to an explosion moving away from you, this foretells that unfaithful friends will violate your rights and increase your confidence. Girls should be wary of colleagues of the opposite sex after this dream. Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sound of a bird in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The chirping of birds in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and the arrival of good things. Other interpretations... A bird singing and hearing a bird sing in the house or room, by Ibn Sirin, by Al-Nabulsi, by Imam Al-Sadiq and others, in the continuation of the topic: Seeing the sound of birds in a dream for one girl is evidence of the fulfillment of her desire, and the interpretation of a dream about the sound of birds in A man’s dream is evidence of goodness and good living for him soon. Possibilities that the dreamer can see in this article: Interpretation of the sound of a bird in a dream. The sound of a bird in a dream. It is evidence that the dreamer will receive good news and secret advice with all people. Hearing the sounds of birds in a dream indicates good words or scientific studies. Birds chirping in a dream is joy and love. Pure, successful family harmony and having children. Many birds are effortless money for the one who lives in a dream. The beautiful sound of birds in a dream indicates singing, joy and happiness. The bird is a man of great value. Whoever sees that he has hit a bird or owned it, he will be able to defeat a man of great value. And whoever sees Birds that cannot sing are an indication of the fetus in the mother’s womb, and whoever sees the slaughter of a bird in a dream will gain what he wants from that person. If he sees that he has plucked his feathers or eaten his flesh, then his money will be affected by the song of one bird or a group of birds that expresses good news or good news. And whoever sees that he has a bird in his hand or in his cage, and then it flies away and does not return to it, then his son will die. Whoever sees that he is sewing up the eyes of birds, he will deceive the boys and deceive them. The song of a free bird indicates good news. And whoever sees that a bird has entered a ring, and if it has a child, then he will fall into a well. And whoever sees that he has many birds, he will finance and take care of people in danger. As for chirping in a cage, if he is sad, this is a sign of fears and complaints on the radio. Birds show meeting, intimacy and love with family and relatives in joys or sins, defeat and separation. Seeing crowds indicates the gathering of family and relatives, friendliness and love. Among them, and God knows best. Interpretation of the sound of a bird in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she wakes up to the sound of birds early in the morning, this is evidence that she will hear happy and enjoyable news about this girl in the coming days. And if a girl sees in a dream that she is buying decorative birds, and they are beautiful and have Many colors, this is evidence of the success of that girl. Interpretation of the sound of a bird in a dream for a married woman. Hearing the sound of a bird in a dream is evidence of the good and joyful news that will happen, and the fortuneteller will hear it during the difficult period, and this interpretation applies to the dreams of men and women. If a married woman sees in a dream that she She buys birds and puts them in a cage, this is evidence of pregnancy soon. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband gave her a gift of birds, this is evidence of how much her husband loves her, and that this woman lives in happiness and stability, and God Almighty knows. Interpretation of the sound of a bird in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she woke up to the sound of birds in her house, this is evidence of a natural and easy birth, and that this woman will give birth to her male child, God willing. And if

Interpretation of the sound of a bird in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she woke up to the sound of birds in her house, this is evidence of a natural and easy birth, and that this woman will give birth to her male child, God willing. And if

title: Interpretation of seeing a yellow cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a yellow cat in a dream usually indicates that the fortune teller has made many mistakes in his life, noting that seeing a cat in a dream varies in interpretation depending on the color and shape of the cat, and given the importance of knowing the interpretations of some, we will discuss the most important of them according to what the great interpreters have stated. Interpretation of seeing a yellow cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of seeing a yellow cat in a dream? The person who dreams of petting a small yellow cat is evidence that he is walking on the wrong path that will lead to his death and commit many sins that will distance him from his Lord over time. Seeing a yellow cat is evidence of the presence of a hypocrite in the life of the enlightened person who tries in every way to control his thoughts, steal his mind and control it. The interpreters also mentioned that this dream shows that the dreamer is doing many shameful things that are completely contrary to religious teachings and social values. Anyone who sees himself playing with a yellow cat indicates that he has recently obtained money illegally. Anyone who sees himself chasing a yellow cat for a long time shows that the dreamer is always walking on a path full of problems and anything that conflicts with religious and social values. Attacking a yellow cat in a dream is a sign of The fortune teller will be exposed to a serious illness that may end in his death. Seeing more than one yellow cat in a dream is clear evidence that the dreamer suffers from envy and hatred from everyone around him, so it is better to strengthen himself with verses of wise remembrance and prayer. Interpretation of seeing a yellow cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a yellow cat in a dream, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, indicates anxiety and excessive thinking all the time, and the dreamer faces many obstacles in his life that do not allow him to reach his goals. Seeing a yellow cat with two heads indicates that the dreamer has a choice between two things and feels confused about them, but there is no benefit in either of them, so it is better to think of something new. Seeing a yellow cat, its interpretation, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, is evidence of his deception and deception by someone close to the dreamer, while expelling it from the house is evidence that the dreamer is trying to escape from the path of sin. And he feels remorse for all the mistakes he has made recently. Interpretation of seeing a yellow cat in a dream for a single woman The dream shows that the unmarried woman is going through many difficulties in her life and the more she reaches a solution, the more complicated things become, but thanks to God (Glory be to Him), these days will pass, no matter how long it takes and how impossible it is. Despite the reasons of the seer. Among the interpretations is the failure of the single woman in an important matter in her life, it is possible that the failure is in work, study or emotional relationship, and this varies from one dreamer to another. Seeing a yellow cat for an unmarried woman is clear evidence of committing immorality and disobedience, and the dream is a warning from God to stay away from this path. Expelling the yellow cat and attacking it for an unmarried woman is evidence of her dissatisfaction with her wrong behavior and trying to control herself and stay away from this path full of everything that disobeys our Lord Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a yellow cat in a dream for a married woman The dream explains that

title: Seeing bananas in a married woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of seeing bananas in a married woman’s dream

preview.html: Seeing bananas in a dream for a married woman. This vision is considered one of the good visions, as bananas are one of the favorite fruits for many people, as stated in the Holy Qur’an. Everything mentioned in the Qur’an about food and fruit is good, and there is much evidence for that. Showing his sight, whether it is yellow or green, and seeing bananas is considered inauspicious if it comes out of season, and we will learn about the explanations of scholars in this article, led by the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing bananas in a dream for Ibn Sirin’s wife. Seeing bananas in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing bananas for a married woman is good news. For the marriage of her daughters if they are not married, and Ibn Sirin believes that this also means that she will receive happy news soon. If the banana is yellow in her dream, this is not good and indicates that she will suffer from some disease. A dream about seeing bananas may mean that she is trying everything in her power to raise Her children in a correct and sound manner and that she is aware of her rights and duties. If this woman is a worker, this is an indication of her success in her work and her obtaining double wages. Seeing bananas in a dream for Ibn Sirin’s wife Bananas in a dream indicate to a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, that it is a sign of improvement. Her circumstances financially and socially, and that she will witness the harvest of her success in the coming days. This vision also symbolizes her ability to escape from the negative influences that were disturbing her life and eliminate the causes that lead to problems in her life. If a married woman sees herself picking bananas, she will reap the fruits of success and ambition. And she escaped from the dangers that she was facing. The dream also means that she has a good personality with her husband and good morals with him, and she can make radical decisions to solve her problems. If she sees bananas outside the harvest season and outside of it, this vision is unfavorable and indicates unpleasant situations that will happen to her and may indicate She will gain her strength after being patient for a long time. Seeing bananas in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dream interpreters believe that the interpretation of the appearance of bananas in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a boy, that his health will be good, and that he will be a reason for her prosperity. It also expresses her feeling of psychological comfort and ease of giving birth without difficulties preventing her. From a feeling of happiness. If she buys bananas in her dream, this is evidence that she will have children and a lot of money, as this indicates the goodness that is coming for her and her family. Also, buying a lot of bananas indicates the abundance of her livelihood and gains in life, as well as the improvement of her and her family’s financial situation. Often Seeing bananas for a pregnant woman reflects kindness and a praiseworthy vision for her, especially if she suffers from anxiety during pregnancy. Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of seeing eating bananas in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a vision Someone eating bananas in a married woman’s dream indicates the tranquility of that woman’s home, peace and blessings in it, and that she will be psychologically and financially stable during the coming period of her life. If she sees that she is...

title: Interpretations of seeing watercress in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Watercress in a pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating cardamom, this indicates that she will give birth to a male, but he is strong, cruel, rude, and cunning. Watercress in a pregnant woman’s dream usually carries interpretations that are not positive, but rather harmful or negative interpretations, such as a difficult or difficult birth. And similar strong themes that destroy life. Watercress in a man’s dreamIf one sees watercress in his dream, this is a sign that he will suffer a great loss that may be in his home or business. Buying cardamom in a dreamIf a man or woman dreams of buying cardamom in his dream, this is his interpretation, and God knows best. That there are problems ahead of him, but they can be avoided, while interpretation books generally show that buying cardamom in general indicates a problem or entering into a clash with some people that you may have known in the past, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing cardamom in one dreamUnfortunately, seeing watercress in a person’s dream usually It indicates bad news such as delayed marriage, lack of children, despair and disappointment, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Watercress in a married woman’s dream. Seeing watercress in a married woman’s dream means that her husband is a domineering, strong and powerful man, and eating watercress in a married woman’s dream also means her abundant fertility and enjoyment of her high femininity, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about watercress for a merchant: cardamom usually means loss of livelihood in a dream for a merchant, and God knows best. Another interpretation of seeing watercress in a dream. Commentators went to the fact that cardamom could be an indication of material gains and great gains, and it could indicate that the sleeper will be exposed to a very big disaster in his money in the face of it. Especially, such as losing or losing money. We have shown you different interpretations of seeing cardamom in a dream, eating it, selling it, or buying it from both a pregnant woman, a single man, a married man, and a merchant, but in the end, green cardamom usually conveys something what. Harmful or harmful to the dreamer. We emphasize that all dream interpretations are personal interpretations of senior scholars derived from the Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah.

title: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about distributing money to children: Distributing money: Children are an indicator of the many good deeds that the dreamer has done. The vision symbolizes the dreamer doing good deeds for the sake of God. Interpretation of a dream about distributing money to relatives: Distributing money to relatives is a sign of getting rid of the fears and sorrows that the dreamer is experiencing. The vision indicates The disappearance of problems and obstacles in the viewer’s life, and the vision portends love and a strong bond between the dreamer and those with whom he shares money in the vision. The vision symbolizes hearing good news that will make the dreamer happy. Interpretation of a dream about distributing money to the poorGiving money to the poorIn a dream, the dream feels happy, a sign of his love of spending to get Reward. Distributing money to the poor and the dreamer is unhappy in the dream indicates his failure to pay alms. Interpretation of a dream about saving money for a married woman. A married woman’s vision of someone giving her money in a dream indicates her emotional need. Obtaining money from death in a dream is a sign of a lot of nourishment that she will receive in the few days. Next.Seeing giving money in a dream to a married woman symbolizes improving her situation, overcoming many difficult situations and rising again.DownloadMoney from another person in a dream is an indication that he always helps and supports her. They symbolize seeing counting money in a dream, it shows that she can take responsibility Her home and she is able to manage all her affairs. Stealing money from his wife is a sign that she lacks many needs and desires that she wants to fulfill. Giving money to the husband is a sign for his wife that he is giving her all her rights and what she asks of him. Seeing coins in a dream for a married woman means that she will give birth GirlInterpretation of a vision of supplying paper moneyGiving paper money in a dream means getting rid of the problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces. The vision of providing paper money symbolizes starting a new project, travel itinerary, or purchasing a new car or property. Obtaining paper money in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from problems. The vision heralds The traveler will return to his family soon. Seeing paper money indicates that the dreamer is doing his best to achieve his desires and goals. Interpretation of the dream of receiving money from a familiar person They herald the vision of Take a bill. The person known to be suffering from neonatal glaucoma is the dreamer. They symbolize seeing Take money from a man who is known for his fairness in many good deeds, The dreamer’s desire to become a student at his hands and follow the path of this man, and God knows best. Knowing that he took money from a known person whose money was forbidden is evidence that the dreamer is an immoral person like him, and God knows best. Receiving a lot of money from an unknown person in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a hypocrite and a liar in A dream. Taking money from a specific person in a dream suggests focusing on important issues that connect the dreamer with him in reality. Seeing a monarch taking money from a person indicates a good relationship with him, and it is an indication of an increase in the ties that unite them and the continuation of this relationship. Single Who dreams of taking money from His son points out that it is paved with cobblestones

title: Interpretation of praising the dead in a dream

preview.html: Because praising God is one of the good things that a Muslim must insist on all the time, and today we will talk about seeing praising a dead person in a dream in detail from gptafser.com/.Interpretation of praising a dead person in a dream for an unmarried girl. An unmarried girl who sees a dead man swimming in a dream and he was smiling. A praiseworthy vision, as it indicates that he is in a beautiful place in the afterlife, and is enjoying the hereafter. The vision also suggests drawing the woman’s attention to the necessity of performing acts of worship and getting closer to God Almighty, and God knows best. As for an unmarried girl who sees herself swimming in a dream, it is a good vision. Because It indicates that there are happy times, and good news is approaching the dreamer, and God knows best. And if a girl dreams that she is swimming in front of many people in a dream. This dream does not deserve praise, because it symbolizes that he has committed many sins and disobedience, and he must sincerely repent and approach God Almighty. And if an unmarried woman sees that she is singing the wedding tasbih while she is sleeping, it is a sign of a lot of sustenance, blessing, and goodness spreading to her in her life, and God knows best. As for seeing a group singing tasbih in a dream for a single girl, it is a sign that the dreamer will undertake several tasks that she will perform, but they are simple, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams for the living crying with the dead. Interpretation of following the praise of the dead in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams that in a dream she is swimming in her room. A sign that she is facing a series of problems in her life and difficult times, but she will overcome them as quickly as possible, and God knows best. As for the married woman who dreams that she is swimming In front of her husband in a dream, the dream symbolizes the dreamer’s intense love for her husband and her devotion to him. As for the married woman who sees herself swimming in front of people in a dream, the dream indicates that she will hear good news about her, which may be the pregnancy or promotion of her husband, God willing, who knows best. Seeing praise in a dream With a loud voice in a dream for a married woman. It is a symbol of removing worry and the end of distress, and enjoying a happy new life, and God knows best. As for a married woman who dreams of a dead man swimming hard and looking at her in a dream. A good vision is that he will receive an inheritance from this dead person, and God knows best. Interpretation Seeing a pregnant woman praising a dead person in a dream and its interpretation: She dreams of a pregnant woman praising a loud voice in a dream. It is a sign of relieving stress, relieving anxiety, and overcoming the exhausting stage of pregnancy well, and God knows best. As for seeing a pregnant woman praising God in front of a large number of people in a dream, it is the best evidence that she will give birth to a child. He is healthy, sound, and free of diseases, and God knows best. Seeing praise in front of her husband in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of her love and devotion to him, and that she keeps him in his absence, and God knows best. As for a pregnant woman, she sees her dead mother swimming in a dream. This dream symbolizes the dreamer’s need for her mother during pregnancy. And childbirth. Seeing a dead man swimming in white clothes and smiling in a dream for a pregnant woman is a metaphor for easy labor and the birth of a beautiful woman, and God knows best. Or if a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a dead man swimming and wearing black clothes in a dream. This dream indicates that the woman is going through a difficult and joyful birth.
